mapper.insert: INSERT INTO zafira.MONITORS (NAME, URL, HTTP_METHOD, REQUEST_BODY, IS_NOTIFICATION_ENABLED, IS_RUNNING, CRON_EXPRESSION, EXPECTED_CODE, RECIPIENTS, TYPE) VALUES ( #{name}, #{url}, #{httpMethod}, #{requestBody}, #{notificationEnabled}, #{running}, #{cronExpression}, #{expectedCode}, #{recipients}, #{type} )
mapper.update: UPDATE zafira.MONITORS SET NAME = #{name}, URL = #{url}, HTTP_METHOD = #{httpMethod}, REQUEST_BODY = #{requestBody}, IS_NOTIFICATION_ENABLED = #{notificationEnabled}, IS_RUNNING = #{running}, CRON_EXPRESSION = #{cronExpression}, EXPECTED_CODE = #{expectedCode}, LAST_CODE = #{lastCode}, LAST_RUN_PASSED = #{lastRunPassed}, RECIPIENTS = #{recipients}, TYPE = #{type} WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.sql: SELECT M.ID AS MONITOR_ID, M.NAME AS MONITOR_NAME, M.URL AS MONITOR_URL, M.HTTP_METHOD AS MONITOR_HTTP_METHOD, M.REQUEST_BODY AS MONITOR_REQUEST_BODY, M.IS_NOTIFICATION_ENABLED AS MONITOR_IS_NOTIFICATION_ENABLED, M.IS_RUNNING AS MONITOR_IS_RUNNING, M.CRON_EXPRESSION AS MONITOR_CRON_EXPRESSION, M.RECIPIENTS AS MONITOR_RECIPIENTS, M.EXPECTED_CODE AS MONITOR_EXPECTED_CODE, M.LAST_CODE AS MONITOR_LAST_CODE, M.LAST_RUN_PASSED AS MONITOR_LAST_RUN_PASSED, M.TYPE AS MONITOR_TYPE, M.CREATED_AT AS MONITOR_CREATED_AT, M.MODIFIED_AT AS MONITOR_MODIFIED_AT FROM zafira.MONITORS M
